data.chText: 影响；涉及
data.enText: affect/involve

data.chText: 影响，涉及，牵涉（某人）
data.enText: to affect sb; to involve sb

data.chText: 不要管与自己无关的事。
data.enText: Don't interfere in what doesn't concern you.

data.chText: 这损失对有关各方来说都是极大的不幸。
data.enText: The loss was a tragedy for all concerned (= all those affected by it) .

data.chText: 在事关我们的孩子的教育问题上，那是毫无妥协余地的。
data.enText: Where our children's education is concerned, no compromise is acceptable.

data.chText: 涉及到的每个人都要作出一些解释。
data.enText: The individuals concerned have some explaining to do.

data.chText: 敬启者（如用于公告或求职推荐信的开头）
data.enText: To whom it may concern … (= used for example, at the beginning of a public notice or of a job reference about sb's character and ability)

data.chText: 所有与该事件有直接牵连的人现在均已辞职。
data.enText: Everyone who was directly concerned in (= had some responsibility for) the incident has now resigned.

data.chText: 关于
data.enText: be about

data.chText: 与…有关；涉及
data.enText: to be about sth

data.chText: 这故事讲的是王子奋力解救帕米娜。
data.enText: The story concerns the prince's efforts to rescue Pamina.

data.chText: 这部书主要讲的是冷战时期的苏美关系。
data.enText: The book is primarily concerned with Soviet-American relations during the Cold War.

data.chText: 本章旨在讲述历史背景。
data.enText: This chapter concerns itself with the historical background.

data.chText: 这些计算机之间的一个主要差异涉及其储存信息的方式。
data.enText: One major difference between these computers concerns the way in which they store information.

data.chText: 使某人担心
data.enText: worry sb

data.chText: 让（某人）担忧
data.enText: to worry sb

data.chText: 让我担心的是我们对事态的变化缺乏准备。
data.enText: What concerns me is our lack of preparation for the change.

data.chText: 你似乎不再在乎，这令我担忧。
data.enText: It concerns me that you no longer seem to care.

data.chText: 感兴趣
data.enText: take an interest

data.chText: （对…）感兴趣
data.enText: to take an interest in sth

data.chText: 他对细节不感兴趣。
data.enText: He didn't concern himself with the details.

data.chText: 认为重要
data.enText: consider important

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.chText: 认为（做某事）重要
data.enText: to think it is important to do sth

data.chText: 她认为有必要写出让大家都能看得清楚的事态的本来面目。
data.enText: She was concerned to write about situations that everybody could identify with.
as/so far as sb/sth is concerned
as/so far as sb/sth goes

data.chText: 就…而言
data.enText: used to give facts or an opinion about a particular aspect of sth

data.chText: 担忧
data.enText: worry

data.chText: （尤指许多人共同的）担心，忧虑
data.enText: a feeling of worry, especially one that is shared by many people

data.chText: 人们对电视上充斥暴力内容的忧虑日益加重。
data.enText: There is growing concern about violence on television.

data.chText: 她已四天不见踪影，大家对她的安全很担心。
data.enText: She hasn't been seen for four days and there is concern for her safety.

data.chText: 报告表达了对失业率居高不下的忧虑。
data.enText: The report expressed concern over continuing high unemployment.

data.chText: 人们普遍对在保护区修建新的房屋感到忧虑。
data.enText: There is widespread concern that new houses will be built on protected land.

data.chText: 工作压力是一件让员工和管理人员都关切的事。
data.enText: Stress at work is a matter of concern to staff and management.

data.chText: 总统的健康正引起公众的严重关切。
data.enText: The President's health was giving serious cause for concern .

data.chText: 选民在会上提出了对卫生保健状况的担忧。
data.enText: In the meeting, voters raised concerns about health care.

data.chText: 保护的愿望
data.enText: desire to protect

data.chText: 关爱；关心
data.enText: a desire to protect and help sb/sth

data.chText: 父母对子女的关爱
data.enText: parents' concern for their children

data.chText: 重要的事
data.enText: sth important

data.chText: （对人、组织等）重要的事情
data.enText: something that is important to a person, an organization, etc.

data.chText: 作为一名作家，你主要关注的是哪些问题？
data.enText: What are your main concerns as a writer?

data.chText: 政府的头等大事是减少犯罪。
data.enText: The government's primary concern is to reduce crime.

data.chText: 责任
data.enText: responsibility

data.chText: （某人）负责的事，有权知道的事
data.enText: something that is your responsibility or that you have a right to know about

data.chText: 这件事由他们负责。
data.enText: This matter is their concern.

data.chText: 我赚多少钱没有必要告诉你。
data.enText: How much money I make is none of your concern.

data.chText: 公司
data.enText: company

data.chText: 公司；商行；企业
data.enText: a company or business

data.chText: 一家大出版公司
data.enText: a major publishing concern
a going concern

data.chText: 生意兴隆的企业；发展中的事业
data.enText: a business or an activity that is making a profit and is expected to continue to do well

data.chText: 他把经营得正红火的小餐馆卖掉了。
data.enText: He sold the cafe as a going concern .

word_means: 负责的事，有权知道的事
simple_means.memory_skill: con 加强 + cern 搞清；区别 → 需要搞清楚 → 关心

means: (尤指许多人共同的)担心，忧虑
（某人）负责的事，有权知道的事

ex.chText: 听到丈夫出了车祸，她非常焦急。
ex.enText: Anxiety overtook her when she heard her husband had had an accident.

ex.chText: 随着夜幕降临，我们越发焦虑。
ex.enText: Our anxiety grew with the falling night.

synonyms.bx: 强调由某事的不确定性而引起的焦虑或恐惧，也指因失败、不幸、灾难等而产生的忧虑心情。

ex.chText: 她单身，没有负担。
ex.enText: She is single, and has no cares.

ex.chText: 她无忧无虑。
ex.enText: She is free from care.

synonyms.bx: 强调因恐惧或责任而产生的忧虑或负担。

ex.chText: 孩子的前途是他最大的担忧。
ex.enText: His child's future was his greatest concern.

ex.chText: 那个妇女非常挂念生病的孩子。
ex.enText: The woman's concern for her sick child is great.

ex.chText: 我关心的只有我的生意。
ex.enText: My concern is only with my business.

synonyms.bx: 强调对和自己或他人有利害关系的人或事物的担心或关切。

ex.chText: 民众对财政政策的忧虑
ex.enText: public unease about financial policy

ex.chText: 大多数学生现在对前途感到越来越不安。
ex.enText: Most students now feel a growing sense of unease about their future.

ex.chText: 缺粮是令他们担忧的事情之一。
ex.enText: Lack of food is one of their worries.

ex.chText: 他一个人生活，无忧无虑。
ex.enText: He lives alone without any worries.

synonyms.bx: 强调心烦意乱，心里老惦记着某人或某事，有时含瞎操心之意。

ex.chText: 这件事很严重，你需要集中精力解决。
ex.enText: This is a serious matter that you need to concentrate on.

ex.chText: 这是该由经理决定的事。
ex.enText: This is a matter for the manager to decide.

synonyms.bx: 通常指关乎利益、命运等的紧要事务，必须予以考虑或解决。

ex.chText: 谁最先报道了水门事件？
ex.enText: Who first reported the Watergate affair?

ex.chText: 婚礼场面非常隆重。
ex.enText: The wedding was a very grand affair.

synonyms.bx: 指令人印象深刻的重大事件或具有某种特点的不寻常之事。

ex.chText: 她对公共事务感兴趣。
ex.enText: She is interested in public affairs.

ex.chText: 不要总是打听我的财务问题。
ex.enText: Don't keep asking about my financial affairs.

tips.tip: affairs 表示公共或政治事务、活动，也可指私事。

ex.chText: 我们来处理尚未了结的事务吧。
ex.enText: Let's get down to the unfinished business.

ex.chText: 我的家庭生活是我的私事。
ex.enText: My family life is my personal business.

ex.chText: 他把作业当作重要的事。
ex.enText: He regarded homework as serious business.

synonyms.bx: 指需要完成或讨论的重要事务，也指归某人管的事或某人持有某种看法的事情。

ex.chText: 当妈妈的最关心什么？
ex.enText: What is a mother's main concern?

ex.chText: 如何控制通货膨胀已成为消费者关注的重要问题。
ex.enText: How to control inflation has become a major concern for consumers.

synonyms.bx: 指关系到某人切身利益、引起其关注或担忧的重要事情。

ex.chText: 那件奇怪的事情让他十分不安。
ex.enText: That strange thing worried him a lot.

ex.chText: 首要的事是改善他们的工作环境。
ex.enText: The first thing to do is to improve their working conditions.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，词义最为广泛，可指任何事实、事件、情况、行为等。

data.enText: as/so far as sb/sth is concerned
as/so far as sb/sth goes

data.chText: 就…而言
data.enText: used to give facts or an opinion about a particular aspect of sth
a going concern

data.chText: 生意兴隆的企业；发展中的事业
data.enText: a business or an activity that is making a profit and is expected to continue to do well

data.chText: 他把经营得正红火的小餐馆卖掉了。
data.enText: He sold the cafe as a going concern .

tr: something that interests you because it is important or affects you
example: the safety of the ship is the captain's concern

tr: something or someone that causes anxiety
example: New York traffic is a constant concern

tr: a feeling of sympathy for someone or something
example: She felt strong concern for those less fortunate
they hushed it up out of fear of public reaction

tr: a commercial or industrial enterprise and the people who constitute it

example: There were lots of questions referring to her talk
My remark pertained to your earlier comments
I worry about the second Germanic consonant shift

example.ex: The group has expressed concern about reports of political violence in Africa...
example.tran: 该团体对有关非洲政治暴力的报道表示关切。

example.ex: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease...
example.tran: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

example.ex: As the militants gather, there is concern that the protest might again run out of control...
example.tran: 随着激进分子的聚集，人们担心抗议活动可能会再次失去控制。

example.ex: There is no cause for concern.
example.tran: 不必担心。

value.def: If something concerns you, it worries you.

example.ex: The growing number of people seeking refuge in Thailand is beginning to concern Western aid agencies...
example.tran: 到泰国寻求庇护的人日益增多，这开始引起了西方援助机构的不安。

example.ex: It concerned her that Bess was developing a crush on Max.
example.tran: 贝丝迷上了马克斯，这让她很担心。

example.ex: I've been concerned about  you lately...
example.tran: 最近我对你有些担心。

example.ex: We're naturally concerned for our daughter's safety...
example.tran: 我们担心女儿的安全，这很自然。

example.ex: Academics and employers are deeply concerned that students are not sufficiently prepared mathematically for university courses.
example.tran: 学生掌握的数学知识不足以应付大学课程，这让大学老师和用人单位非常担心。

example.ex: ...a phone call from a concerned neighbor.
example.tran: 不安的邻居打来的电话

value.def: A concern is a fact or situation that worries you.

example.ex: His concern was that people would know that he was responsible...
example.tran: 他担心大家会知道是他的责任。

example.ex: Unemployment was the electorate's main concern.
example.tran: 选民关心的主要是失业问题。

value.tran: 令人担忧的事实(或情况)

value.def: Someone's concern with something is their feeling that it is important.

example.ex: ...a story that illustrates how dangerous excessive concern with safety can be.
example.tran: 一个说明过分关心安全问题会招致何等麻烦的故事

value.def: Someone's concerns are the things that they consider to be important.

example.ex: Feminism must address issues beyond the concerns of middle-class whites.
example.tran: 女权主义解决的问题不能仅仅局限于中产阶级白人妇女所关心的问题。

value.def: Concern for someone is a feeling that you want them to be happy, safe, and well. If you do something out of concern for someone, you do it because you want them to be happy, safe, and well.

example.ex: Without her care and concern, he had no chance at all...
example.tran: 若非她的关心和照顾，他根本没有机会。

example.ex: He had only gone along out of concern for his two grandsons.
example.tran: 他完全是出于对两个孙子的关心才继续这样做。

value.def: If you concern yourself with something, you give it attention because you think that it is important.

example.ex: I didn't concern myself with politics...
example.tran: 我不关心政治。

example.ex: He would concern himself solely with the plight of the hostages.
example.tran: 他唯一关心的是人质的危险处境。

example.ex: The agency is more concerned with making arty ads than understanding its clients' businesses.
example.tran: 这家广告公司更注重如何制作附庸风雅的广告，而忽视了对客户业务的了解。

value.def: If something such as a book or a piece of information concerns a particular subject, it is about that subject.

example.ex: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children...
example.tran: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

example.ex: Chapter 2 concerns itself with the methodological difficulties.
example.tran: 第二章讲的是研究方法上的难点。

example.ex: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
example.tran: 伦道夫的著作专门论述污染对健康的影响。

value.def: If a situation, event, or activity concerns you, it affects or involves you.

example.ex: It was just a little unfinished business from my past, and it doesn't concern you at all.
example.tran: 这只是我过去的一点未了之事，与你没有任何关系。

value.tran: (情况、事件或活动)对…有影响，与…相关

example.ex: It's a very stressful situation for everyone concerned...
example.tran: 对所有相关人士来说，这一形势非常紧张。

example.ex: I believe he was concerned in all those matters you mention.
example.tran: 我认为你提到的那些事都与他有关。

value.def: If a situation or problem is your concern, it is something that you have a duty or responsibility to be involved with.

example.ex: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army...
example.tran: 技术方面由陆军负责。

example.ex: I would be glad to get rid of them myself. But that is not our concern.
example.tran: 如果能亲自动手摆脱他们我会非常高兴，但那不是我们的分内之事。

value.def: You can refer to a company or business as a concern, usually when you are describing what type of company or business it is.

example.ex: If not a large concern, Queensbury Nursery was at least a successful one.
example.tran: 即使规模不算大，昆斯伯里托儿所至少办得很成功。

value.tran: 公司，企业(通常用于描述其类型)

value.def: You can say 'as far as I'm concerned' to indicate that you are giving your own opinion.

example.ex: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
example.tran: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

value.def: You can say as far as something is concerned to indicate the subject that you are talking about.

example.ex: As far as starting a family is concerned, the trend is for women having their children later in life.
example.tran: 在要孩子方面，目前的趋势是女性要孩子要得比较晚。

value.tran: 就…而言，说到(用于表明所谈论的话题)

value.def: If a company is a going concern, it is actually doing business, rather than having stopped trading or not yet having started trading.

example.ex: The receivers will always prefer to sell a business as a going concern.
example.tran: 破产管理人总是希望在公司仍然正常运转的时候将其卖掉。

gramarinfo.label: N inflects, oft <l>as</l> PHR, v-link PHR

value.def: If something is of concern to someone, they find it worrying and unsatisfactory.

example.ex: Any injury to a child is a cause of great concern to us...
example.tran: 孩子受到任何伤害都会让我们非常担心。

example.ex: The survey's findings are a matter of great concern.
example.tran: 这次调查的结果备受关注。

value.def: If something is of concern to you, it is important to you.

example.ex: How they are paid should be of little concern to the bank as long as they are paid.
example.tran: 只要肯付款，付款方式对银行来说不是很重要。

value.tran: 对…重要的;与…有利害关系的

trans: 从事,忙于(常与with, about, in, over连用)；关心，关注，关切，挂念，担心，忧虑
令人担忧；令人担忧的；重要的
干预；从事（参与；从事参与）；干涉
主要关注点；基本关怀；主要关注；首要关注；首要问题
终极关怀；终极关切；终极关注；终极的关怀
业务兴旺的商行，继续经营的企业
严重关切；严重关注；想望严重关切；严重隐忧；认真看待
人道主义的关怀；人道关怀

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to be sure, to separate 搞清；区别
rootsaffixes.title: cern, cert, cret, crimin

partsOfSpeech.dec: as 加强 + certain 肯定的 → 一再区别 → 确定
cert 搞清；区别 + ain 表名词 → 搞清的 → 肯定的
cert 搞清；区别 + ific 产生…的 + ate 表总称 → 能够作证明的东西 → 证明书
cert 搞清；区别 + ify 使… → 使…清楚 → 证明
cert 搞清；区别 + itude 表情况 → 搞清楚 → 确信
con 加强 + cern 搞清；区别 → 需要搞清楚 → 关心
dis 加强 + cern 搞清；区别 → 识别
dis 加强 + cret 搞清；区别 + e → 加以区别 → 不同的
dis 加强 + cret 搞清；区别 + ion 表状态 → 一再搞清楚 → 谨慎
dis 加强 + crimin 搞清；区别 + ate 做，造成，使… → 区分〔对待〕→ 区别；歧视
dis 加强 + crimin 搞清；区别 + at〔e〕具有…的，有…性质的 + ing 正…的，令人…的 → 有辨别能力的
in 不 + discriminate 歧视 → 不加区别的；一视同仁的
partsOfSpeech.d: 不加区别的；一视同仁的
